titles.title: State and Local Criminal Forensic Laboratory Enhancement Act of 2009
State and Local Criminal Forensic Laboratory Enhancement Act of 2009
To authorize grants to establish and improve criminal forensic laboratories.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: State and Local Criminal Forensic Laboratory Enhancement Act of 2009 - Directs the Attorney General to: (1) award grants to states, local governments, and Indian tribes to establish new criminal forensic laboratories or expand or improve existing laboratories and to hire and train new forensic laboratory professionals; and (2) give priority in awarding such grants to agencies in jurisdictions with the largest backlogs of criminal forensic examinations.
